topic.title: Test parml
topic.shortdesc: This should test most of the attributes available on a parml.

plentry.pd: that was a term. Here is a long definition, one which will wrap. I'm getting tired of coming up with text, it is really not feeling original any more, because I have to do it so often. Maybe I should ask Sam to come up with some text and he can write all about his band concerts and that way I would surely not be able to miss any of them.

that was a term. Here is a long definition, one which will wrap. I'm getting tired of coming up with text, it is really not feeling original any more, because I have to do it so often. topic.title: Everything in a parml
topic.shortdesc: This should test putting a lot of stuff in a parml

body.p: Split the parml just for the fun of it. Make the first one compact, this one is not.

plentry.pd:
PCDATAbasic.phbasic.blockitemgrouptxt.incl: test apiname test bold (test boolean ->) test cmdname test codeph test filepath test italic test keyword test menucascade/uicontrol test msgnum test msgph test option test parmname test ph testing a quote (test state => ) test sub test sup test synph test systemoutput test term test tt test underlined test uicontrol test uicontrol/shortcut test userinput test varname test wintitle test cite test xref test tmthis is a draft commentthis is required cleanupThis is a footnote, which is part of txt.incltxt.incl index term
test ul
test ul again
test ul again again testing a table in an example
testing a
basic table
testing a syntaxdiagram
simple table simpler table end of simple table
simple table simpler table end of simple table
this is a screen it makes things windytest pre test pre test pre pt this is a parml test
pt this is a parml test
testing a paragraph. That's a novel idea. well, if it is I should put it in <lq>.
test ol
test ol again
test ol a third time testing a note, just a plain old note, not a special notetest msgblock test msgblock test msgblockLQ: Darryl Strawberry was sentenced to 18 months in prison Monday for violating his probation on a 1999 conviction on drug and solicitation of prostitution charges.test lines test lines test linesFigure in an example
Placing a figure in an example
dl in section this is what a dl in an example looks like
dl in section this is what a dl in an example looks like test codeblock test codeblock test codeblock
